languages.text: "Поступим согласно эдикту Пятого Офелийского собора. Пусть суд поединком определит, кто прав".
"We should follow the edict of the Fifth Ophelian Council. Let might decide whose beliefs are just."
languages.original_text: "Поступим согласно эдикту Пятого Офелийского собора. Пусть суд поединком определит, кто прав".

traits.locale_text: "Let us follow the edict of the Fifth Ophelian Cathedral. Let them decide the one who is right with a fight.
"Let us follow the edict of the Fifth Ophelian Cathedral. Let them decide the one who is right with a fight.
"We should follow the edict of the Fifth Ophelian Council. Let might decide whose beliefs are just."
"We should follow the edict of the Fifth Ophelian Cathedral. Let might decide whose beliefs are just.
"We should follow the edict of the Fifth Ophelian Cathedral. Let might decide whose beliefs are just.
"We should follow the edict of the Fifth Ophelian Council. Let might decide whose beliefs are just."
"We should follow the edict of the Fifth Ophelian Council. Let might decide whose beliefs are just."
"We should follow the edict of the Fifth Ophelian Council. Let might decide whose beliefs are just."

languages.text: “我们应当援引欧菲利亚第五议会的法令，通过力量决定信仰的归属。”
languages.original_text: "We should follow the edict of the Fifth Ophelian Council. Let might decide whose beliefs are just."

traits.locale_text: “我们应当援引欧菲利亚第五议会的法令，通过力量决定信仰的归属。”
“我们应当援引欧菲利亚第五大教堂的法令，通过力量决定信仰的归属。”

languages.text: «Deberíamos seguir el edicto del Quinto Consejo de Ophelia. Que la fuerza determine qué creencias son justas».
languages.original_text: "We should follow the edict of the Fifth Ophelian Council. Let might decide whose beliefs are just."

traits.locale_text: «Deberíamos seguir el edicto del Quinto Consejo de Ophelia. Que la fuerza determine qué creencias son justas».

languages.text: 「オフィーリア第五評議会の勅令に従わねばならない。誰の信念が公正であるか、決めることができるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "We should follow the edict of the Fifth Ophelian Council. Let might decide whose beliefs are just."

traits.locale_text: 「オフィーリア第五大聖堂の勅令に従わねばならない。誰の信念が公正であるか、決めることができるかもしれない」
「オフィーリア第五大聖堂の勅令に従わねばならない。誰の信念が公正であるか、決めることができるかもしれない」

languages.text: « Nous suivrons à la lettre l'édit du Cinquième Conseil Ophélien. C'est la force martiale qui désignera les justes. »
languages.original_text: "We should follow the edict of the Fifth Ophelian Council. Let might decide whose beliefs are just."

traits.locale_text: « Nous suivrons à la lettre l'édit du Cinquième Conseil Ophélien. C'est la force martiale qui désignera les justes. »

languages.text: "Wir sollten das Edikt des Fünften Ophelischen Konzils befolgen. Möge die Macht entscheiden, wessen Glaube gerecht ist."
languages.original_text: "We should follow the edict of the Fifth Ophelian Council. Let might decide whose beliefs are just."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sollten das Edikt des Fünften Ophelischen Konzils befolgen. Möge die Macht entscheiden, wessen Glaube gerecht ist."
"Wir sollten das Edikt der Fünften Ophelischen Kathedrale befolgen. Die Stärke soll entscheiden, wessen Überzeugungen die richtigen sind."

languages.text: "Beşinci Ofelya Konseyi'nin buyruğunu yerine getirmeliyiz. Kimin inancının haklı olduğuna kudret karar versin."
languages.original_text: "We should follow the edict of the Fifth Ophelian Council. Let might decide whose beliefs are just."

traits.locale_text: "Beşinci Ofelya Konseyi'nin buyruğunu yerine getirmeliyiz. Kimin inancının haklı olduğuna kudret karar versin."
